articles.author: Niccolo Conte
articles.title: Visualized: America’s Surge in Measles Cases in 2025 - Visual Capitalist
articles.description: U.S. measles cases in 2025 have already surpassed 2019's high levels, making it the worst measles outbreak since 1992.
